Twerking

Twerking in Thailand

Sweat with Simba

Your local friend:

Simba

About:

Simba is a self-taught twerker based around the world, he spends most of his time in Thailand perfecting his twerking skills, doing a whole lot of Tinder'ing and a bit of coding on the side.

Course Details:

Location: Koh Pha Ngan, Thailand

Duration: 2 nights

Level: Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced, everyone is welcome.

Price: $250 USD

What you'll learn:

Learn how to twerk in Thailand and shape that booty - and if you're lucky, you might also learn how to code on the side.

Where we'll be:

Full Moon Beach or whereever agreed.

What I'll provide:

I will provide you with my finest expertise in twerking and booty shaking moves.

Good to know

Make sure you are in good shape as twerking ain't an easy sport. Be prepared to SWEAT with Simba.

Where we'll meet:

Full Moon Beach or whereever agreed.
